action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.

bill.summary: PILT and Refuge Revenue Sharing Permanent Funding Act - Provides permanent funding for the Bureau of Land Management's payment in lieu of taxes program (PILT) and the U.S. Fish and Wildlife Service's refuge revenue sharing program.
